title: Egypte, Nubie et Abyssinie.
creator: Malte-Brun, Conrad, 1775-1826
extent: 1 map : hand color ; 31 x 23 cm on sheet (38 x 28)
description: Antique hand colored map of Egypt, Nubia, and Abyssinia (Modern day Egypt, Sudan, Eritrea, Djibouti, and part of Ethiopia). Publication date from the library's acquisition form.
coverage-spatial: Egypt; Nubia; Sudan; South Sudan; Ethiopia; Africa
